This item is now Free. Add a toggle to enable/disable the custom rotation locks instead of it applying by default.

Add custom icon padding options

Fix a crash which occurred when the "Launch App" option was enabled for custom Control Center timers and Platters is installed.

Remove IconSupport dependency
Adds new strings to customize for both Lockscreen and Status Bar.

Adds support for Palert for the dynamic alerts.

Fixes custom WiFi calling carrier not applying when Wifi calling is connected.

Perfomance updates
General

- Improved memory management to improve battery usage
- Fix crash when using Brightness Activator Pro

Control Center Options

- Fix some options being enabled even if they weren't enabled
- Fix button text not being fully removed when option is enabled

Icon Options

- When icon labels are hidden the icon dot will be centered with the icon instead of it being moved up and overlapping the icon.

Powerdown Options

- Fix crash when enabling the reboot slider without enabling the respring slider.

Weather App Options

- Adds option to display current temperature as the app badge. This option is not available for iPads due to no Weather app



App Switcher Settings
- Add option to display notification badges on icons
- Add option to set the homecard blur to transparent

Control Center Settings
- Fix issues where settings wouldn't stick after a respring

Icon Settings
- Add option back from HideMeX (iOS 9) to color icon badges based on dominant app icon color. This option returns with additional controls to configure a custom color instead. There is also an option to decide whether a border should be used and it's color.

- Add two new types of icon dot indicators. These have now been grouped together under the "Icon Label Dots" category in the Icon settings page. The two available new dots are a notification indicator which is great for when hiding icon badges and a app running indicator dot.

Camera App Settings
- Fix double tap to flip crashing on iPads



Control Center Options
- Add option to import Cream2 toggle colors
- Add Polus support to toggle coloring

Homescreen Options
- Add option to disable rotation
- Add option to disable scrolling

Lockscreen Options
- Add option to skip passcode screen after respring
- Add option to remove passcode button rings

Notification Center Options
- Add option to always show the batteries widget
- Fix NC Page dots being hidden by default with no way to show them

Music Change Options
- Add option to disable banners from being presented when in now playing app

Phone App Options
- Add option to suppress certain types of calls from appearing in the Recents tab. Available options are cellular, FaceTime Audio, FaceTime Video, and third-party apps.

Restriction Options
- Add option to lock apps to orientations
- Modify some settings icons

Settings App Options
- Fix OTA Badge not fully being disabled
Alert Options

- Fix issue which caused SIM alerts not to be disabled

App switcher Options

- Fix spelling mistakes in preferences

Homescreen Options

- Fix issue where downloading/updating an app when also disabling icon shadow overlay causes the icon to have square corners until finished.

- Fix issue when colorizing force touch background blur it made the icon below the force menu not open the app when tapped.

Lockscreen Options

- Fix "Touch ID does not recognize your fingerprint" not applying
- Fix spelling mistakes in preferences
- Add option to use a vibrant clock/date label view

Phone App Options

- Fix spelling mistakes in preferences
- Fix Voicemail tab not disabling when turned on in options

Reactions Options

- Music Changes
- Change banners to iOS 10 style
- Add option to use iOS 9 style notification if preferred this style to begin with


App Switcher Options

- Add option to hide inactive apps from switcher
- Add option to remove blur view entirely

Control Center Options

- Add option to disable status updates ("Do Not Disturb: On" etc)
- Add option to disable button titles

Home screen Options

- Fix "Disable Wallpaper Zoom" option

Lockscreen Options

- Add option to set custom "Enter Passcode" text
- Add option to set custom "Touch ID does not recognize your fingerprint" text
- Add option to set custom "Touch ID or Enter Passcode" text
- Add option to set custom "Try Again" text
- Add option to set custom "Your passcode is required to enabled Touch ID" text
- Add option to set custom "Wipe the home button to clean the sensor." text
- Add option to remove black fade when unlocking (This occurs when user has two different wallpaper set or app is in the foreground)
- Add option to remove now playing artwork
- Add option to remove now playing background blur
- Add option to remove now playing view completely
- Add option to remove the sound when pressing passcode keys

Notification Center Options

- Fix "Show On First Swipe" option not working correctly

Settings App Options

- Add option to disable AppStore apps section
- Add option to hide the software update badge on cells

Status Bar Options

- Add option to remove padlock and "unlocked" text
- Fix crash when hiding "NoService/Searching"
- Fix status bar clock not hiding correctly

Systemwide Options

- Add option to disable sound/vibration when connected to power



v 1.0.3 Changelog

- Add option to blacklist applications you don't want Medusa enabled for
- Add option to disable battery view (charging view) from Lockscreen when device is plugged into power
- Add option to remove iOS 10 iMessage plugin buttons from the text entry view of the Messages app
- Add option to remove page dots from Control Center
- Add option to remove all contents from Passcode Buttons on Lockscreen
- App option to remove small letters from Passcode Buttons on Lockscreen
- Add option to remove white overlay from Control Center
- Add option to show date in Notification Center as one line

- Add Camera app options from HMX9
- Add option to have HDR always on
- Add option to warn when flash is going to be use to take a picture
- Integrate TapTapFlip to camera options

- Add Phone app options from HMX9

- Modify custom time formatter code to auto-enable refreshing status bar every second if user enables seconds in their custom time formatter instead of requiring them to rurn on option to refresh status bar so often.

- QuickEdit box animates closer to the look of the stock app deletion x box

- Fix crash when QE menu is turned on and user downloads an app
- Fix crash when user taps on Slider cell value in settings and manually enters a value
- Fix crash when user entered value of slider cell as .xx without a leading 0
- Fix custom icon scale affecting the dock when Harbor is installed. If Harbor is enabled docked icons won't be affected anymore to allow Harbor to handle how it resizes dock icons
- Fix some system wide settings turning on when not really turned on in settings
- Fix QuickEdit page titles not matching contents of page
Add hiding deprecated 32bit alerts ("[AppName] may slow down your device" alerts)

Change the way the Quick Edit menu is activated. Instead of tapping the icon, which conflicts with Anemone, you'll now see a new button similar to the app deletion button which you can tap to enter Quick Edit.

Fix custom screenshot color option in setting not animating in/out correctly

Fix custom time formatter not adhering to the lowercase AM/PM option. It will now also lowercase your custom formatter if enabled.

Update spelling/wording in some preference pages


Fix crash which happens when changing settings which affect icon appearance
